name: Beefy Bolognese
keywords: Bolognese, Beef, Hearty, Italian, Main Course, Onion, Olive Oil, Curry Powder, Paprika, Beef Stock Powder, Black Pepper, Thyme, Vegemite, Tomatoes, Garlic, Peas, Pasta, Cheese, Chilli, Soy Sauce
description: Strong beefy bolognese recipe. Not at all authentic, but something I like to make.

recipeInstructions.text: Fry onion in olive oil until softened. Add beef and fry on a high heat, constantly mixing until cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Fry Onion and Beef

recipeInstructions.text: Add everything other than the tomatoes and water and cook for about 2 minutes while stirring everything together.
recipeInstructions.name: Add Spices and Vegemite

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tomatoes and water and cook for about 30-40 minutes or until you reach the desired consistency. Make sure you mix it every now and then.
recipeInstructions.name: Simmer with Tomatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Once it is the desired consistency it is ready to serve!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve

notes: Serve with peas or pasta adding a bit of your preferred cheese on top to finish it off! When I make this for myself I like to add some chilli to spice things up a little bit and I mix the cheese through the pasta before adding the beef on top.
Also if you do not have access to any vegemite a splash of soy sauce will make up for it.
